[h1] FUCKIN LOVE THIS GAME [/h1]
Einfach wahnsinn wie ein Spiel, welches im Jahr 2004 hier auf Steam ver√∂ffentlicht wurde, noch so viel Spielspa√ü bereiten kann. 
Die Storyline ist der Hammer, man findet sich gut in die Story ein wenn man bereits den vorherigen Teil gespielt hat, dies ist jedoch nicht zwingend notwendig um dem Spielgeschehen folgen zu k√∂nnen. Kurz und knackig:

Negativ:
-Viele Ladesequenzen (jedes Kapitel wird einzeln geladen, geht aber schnell)

Positiv:
-Storyline
-Lustige elemente
-Deutsche Sprachsynchronisation
-Spa√üfaktor top

Fazit:
[b] Klare Kaufempfehlung! [/b] Wer ein bock auf ein Spiel mit einer guten Storyline hat, aber nicht so viel Wert auf Grafik legt, wird hier nicht entt√§uscht werden! 
Ich w√ºrde es absolut feiern, wenn HL3 noch erscheinen wird. W√ºrde es auf jeden Fall kaufen ohne mit der Wimper zu zucken! 
-Over and out

Oh boy, was this game a really big part of my childhood. 
Replaying now on steam really just gives me that very nostalgic feel to it. 
One day I went to my nephews house to play some random games with him.
I was surprised at how fun this game was then, and today it's still pretty fun to this day in my opinion. 
I recommend this game to anyone who likes playing shooters, because this game is such an Masterpiece!

This game is nowhere near my favorite game, nor is it in my top 5, but it might just make it into my top 10. A lot of the time the gun play is meh, The majority of guns are ‚Äòinherently‚Äô good; the revolver, the crossbow, the gravity gun, shotgun, the AR12, and the RPG, but the 9mm pistol and the SMG1 are (in my opinion) bad weapons. The inaccuracy of all weapons makes pretty much all the fights horribly un-fun. The story is great, most of the puzzles are incredibly easy. The hardest puzzles in the game were actually just where to go in some parts, weird hidden doors make it hard to figure it out. The game has almost no personality, with only a few characters being memorable, and one of them is only in the game for like 10-20 minutes (Father Grigori). The game is all around fun, but doesn‚Äôt even come close to the portal series.

7.5/10 - Will definitely play again.
Not bad at all! Thumbs up.

Half Life 2 is one of those games that is considered the best of all time. Why's that?

Because it did pretty much everything right. The graphics, game engine and physics were a breakthrough for a game in 2004. The combat although simplified from Half Life 1 was still satisfying with more creativity using the Gravity Gun. The level design was brilliant with each chapter being unique from the rest. The story and presentation was decent with great characterisation and decent voice acting. The music while not as exceptional to the likes of other composers is still enjoyable to listen to. Any negative I would have with this game will be greatly overshadowed by a fantastic singleplayer experience. The same can be applied for both Episodes 1 and 2.

An extraordinary game, for its time especially. Many people still play it up to this day, and maybe in the future as well, just like what I am doing!

Half-Life 2 is about fighting off an interplantary race that use other civilizations through out dimensions, universes, galaxies, solar systems and planets to their own beneficial use. What is better than fighting off the unknown species called the 'Combine'? For me? Nothing. The Half-Life series is well story driven, despite the trilogy not released yet, which should come in due time.

If you want to fight interplanetary species with various weapons, along with the iconic crowbar, this game is for you. If you have the money to buy this game, I have two words for you.

BUY IT. That is as simple as I can put it. Just buy the damn game. You'll love it.

10/10
